config.pingstabilizer.title: Ping Stabilizer Configuration
config.pingstabilizer.experimental.warni:
§c§l⚠ WARNING: EXPERIMENTAL FEATURES
§rThese settings are for debugging only.
They may cause crashes or log spam.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.tcpNoDelay:
Disables Nagle's algorithm (TCP_NODELAY).
§aSignificantly reduces latency by sending packets instantly.
§eHighly recommended for PvP.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.priorityFl:
Immediately flushes combat packets (e.g., Attack/Block).
§aEnsures your hits register as fast as possible.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.customBuff:
Override socket buffer sizes.
§cOnly change this if you know what you are doing.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.sendBuffer: Size of the send buffer in KB.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.receiveBuf: Size of the receive buffer in KB.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.smartQueue:
Intelligent packet scheduler.
§aPrioritizes combat/movement packets.
§ePrevents network congestion.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.adaptiveTh:
Dynamically groups low-priority packets during lag spikes.
§aHelps stabilize your ping when jitter is high.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.maxHoldMs: Maximum time a low-priority packet can be delayed.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.enableDebu: Writes network debug info to a file on your Desktop.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.showJitter:
Displays connection variance.
§cHigh Jitter = Lag Spikes.
§aLow Jitter = Smooth Gameplay.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.openHudPos: To edit HUD positions, press the configured key (Default: H) in-game.
hud.pingstabilizer.position_screen.title: Ping Stabilizer HUD Position
